sentences.en: All the attractions of the peninsula beckon.
sentences.cn: 半岛上的各处景点无不令人心驰神往。

sentences.en: An unlimited series of difficult challenges beckon to you in locations all over the world.
sentences.cn: 困难的挑战无限的系列召唤对您在地点全世界.

sentences.en: Boat trips beckon on the lake.
For leisure, the swimming pool and gymnasium beckon, with steam and sauna facilities.
sentences.cn: 在休闲设施方面, 我们有游泳池和体育馆, 还有蒸汽和桑拿设施供您享用.

sentences.en: I could see my husband beckoning me.
sentences.cn: 我看到我丈夫在向我招手。

sentences.en: If the past is any guide, spectacular returns beckon for some.
sentences.cn: 如果历史可以借鉴, 丰厚的利润是很有吸引力的.

sentences.en: In HaiLan, sunlight dances on deep blue water and sandy beaches beckon to eager beachgoers.
sentences.cn: 印象深刻的人和事很多, 可是你如果到了海南,你就不会忘记这个美丽的地方.

sentences.en: In verse 7 Andrew and Simon Peter beckon to James and John in the other boat.
sentences.cn: 第7节安德烈和西门“招呼”在另一只船上的雅各和约翰.

sentences.en: Kate turned to beckon Peter across from the car, but Bill waved him back, meanwhile pushing Kate inside.
sentences.cn: 凯特转身示意汽车对面的彼得过来，可是比尔却挥手示意他回去，同时把凯特推进车内。

sentences.en: My songs beckon softly through the night to you.
sentences.cn: 我的歌声穿过黑夜.向你轻轻飞去.

sentences.en: Seen from afar, its towering buildings beckon the visitor in.
sentences.cn: 从远处看，它高耸的大楼召唤着拜访者进去。

sentences.en: She crooked her finger to beckon him.
The bright lights of Hollywood beckon many.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的花花世界吸引了很多人。

sentences.en: The wave for Hawaii beckon surfers from all around the world.
sentences.cn: 夏威夷的海浪吸引着世界各地的冲浪者前来.

sentences.en: Vietnam and Western China now beckon.
sentences.cn: 越南和中国西部正在招手.

sentences.en: With the sweet sound of their singing they beckon to you for me.
sentences.cn: 她要用那甜蜜歌声诉说我的爱情.

trans.tran_cn: 招手示意，吸引，很可能发生
trans.tran_en: to make a signal to someone with your hand, to show that you want them to come towards you or to follow you
